mapper.select: select rev.order_id,ord.user_id,it.goods_id,it.order_id,it.goods_name from tb_newbee_mall_order_item as it left join review as rev on rev.order_id=it.order_id and rev.goods_id=it.goods_id left join tb_newbee_mall_order as ord on it.order_id=ord.order_id where rev.order_id is null and user_id=#{userId} and it.goods_id=#{goodsId};
